name: GraveHard
description:
GraveHard is just a little fun experience made up of 3 normal platformer levels with a twist for the game jam.

the twist: an AI helps you finish the levels by modifying them depending on where you died. this happens only 3 times so you need to carefully choose your death position.

Um... I also didn't have the time to add sound.
